Today, the Tri An Thuy Dien factory in

Exactly at 8 o'clock on the same day, Tri An hydroelectric power plant
stopped releasing water through the downstream stream, the dam
retreated downstream,
revealing many hectares of empty land. At this time,
people brought fishing nets and rackets to guide rafts and
boats.  Plunging into the water to catch fish, some

since the previous stop in Trang commune.  Every
time the Tri An hydropower plant discharges fish from the
Dong Nai river, it follows the water upstream to the
source. When it reaches the dam, the fish get stuck
at the foot of the dam and cannot continue. Therefore,
when the hydropower plant closes the discharge gate, the fish eyes
get stuck in the water.  below the foot of the dam This
is the time people look forward to every year and
consider it as heaven attracting thousands of
people to participate in fishing.

Today, Tan Bien district police,
